nodes.name: Ownable

nodes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferOwnership

approve
allowance

nodes.documentation:
approve should be called when allowed[_spender] == 0. To increment
allowed value is better to use this function to avoid 2 calls (and wait until
the first transaction is mined)
From MonolithDAO Token.sol

@title Pausable
@dev Base contract which allows children to implement an emergency stop mechanism.
nodes.name: Pausable

nodes.documentation: @dev modifier to allow actions only when the contract IS paused
nodes.name: whenNotPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev modifier to allow actions only when the contract IS NOT paused
nodes.name: whenPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state
nodes.name: pause

nodes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state
nodes.name: unpause

nodes.documentation:

nodes.documentation:

@param totalAltDeposits total amount ETH equivalent

nodes.documentation:

nodes.documentation:

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the owner to close the sale and stop accepting ETH.
The ownership of the token contract is transfered to this owner.
nodes.name: closeSale

devdoc.details: The main HERO token sale contract

closeSale().details: Allows the owner to close the sale and stop accepting ETH. The ownership of the token contract is transfered to this owner.

retrieveTokens(address).details: Allows the owner to transfer ERC20 tokens to the multisig vault

params._token: the contract address of the ERC20 contract

setAltDeposits(uint256).details: Allows to set the toal alt deposit measured in ETH to make sure the hardcap includes other deposits

setHardcap(uint256).details: Allows the owner to set the hardcap.

setMinimum(uint256).details: Allows the owner to set the minimum purchase.

setMultisigVault(address).details: Allows the owner to set the multisig contract.

setSaleOngoing(bool).details: Allows the owner to stop the sale

params._saleOngoing: whether the sale is ongoing or not

setStart(uint256).details: Allows the owner to set the starting time.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

devdoc.title: MainSale
